content.question: In the work shown, textural accents such as coconut fiber, feathers, and seashells are attached to the mask’s base in such a way as to

choices.label: enhance the strength of the turtle-shell base
facilitate the movement of the accent materials

content.answer: facilitate the movement of the accent materials

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
